short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the top ten cryptocurrencies with a line chart and 24-hour change.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: CryptoTopTen

CryptoTopTen is an easy-to-use and minimalist extension that keeps you informed about the top 10 cryptocurrencies in real-time. With just one click, you can access a wealth of information, including live price data, 24-hour changes, and line charts, all from the comfort of your browser.

Key Features:

Instant access to the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market cap
Live price updates directly from CoinGecko API
24-hour price changes in both percentage and value
Visually appealing line charts for each cryptocurrency
Modern, minimalist, and user-friendly design
Regular updates and dedicated support
Whether you're a seasoned investor or a casual enthusiast, CryptoTopTen provides an effortless way to keep track of the ever-changing world of cryptocurrencies. Stay informed, make informed decisions, and always be one step ahead with CryptoTopTen.
